  csaimt5y-33.40http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's age is more than 5 yearsToday's date − "Date of birth" > 5 years
  nbpsdwa-43.112http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsNo BCG primary series dose was administeredCount of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "BCG vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0
  csailtoet28d-45.40http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's age is less than or equal to 28 daysToday's date − "Date of birth" ≤ 28 days
  cshsinou-42.29http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's HIV status is negative or unknown"HIV status" ≠ "HIV-positive"
  nlvwa-32.90http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsNo live vaccine was administeredToday's date − latest "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) IS NULL
  lvwaitlfw-52.92http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsLive vaccine was administered in the last four weeksToday's date − latest "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) < 4 weeks

  cicrat-52.25http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient is currently receiving antiretroviral therapy"Currently on ART" = TRUE
  ciis-32.31http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient is immunologically stable"Immunologically stable" = TRUE
  cinis-36.32http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient is not immunologically stable"Immunologically stable" = FALSE
  cicnrat-56.26http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient is currently not receiving antiretroviral therapy"Currently on ART" = FALSE
  csaib28da5y-43.50http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's age is between 28 days and 5 years28 days < Today's date − "Date of birth" < 5 years
  cstitrin-45.39http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's TB infection test result is negative"TB infection test result" = "Negative"
  nlvwaitlfw-55.92http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsNo live vaccine was administered in the last four weeksToday's date − latest "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) ≥ 4 weeks
  cstitriutndonry-77.34http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's TB infection test result is unknown (test not done or no result yet)"TB infection test result" IS NULL
  cstitrip-45.39http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient's TB infection test result is positive"TB infection test result" = "Positive"
  cincw-29.25http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient is not clinically well"Clinically well" = FALSE
  cicw-25.24http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsClient is clinically well"Clinically well" = TRUE
  obpsdwa-44.112http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.InputsOne BCG primary series dose was administeredCount of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "BCG vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1
  cidfbv-33.44http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.OutputsClient is due for BCG vaccination"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
  cindfbv-37.48http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.OutputsClient is not due for BCG vaccination"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
  cjirccn-53.66http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.OutputsClinical judgement is required. Create clinical note."Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"
  cjirccn-53.67http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.OutputsClinical judgement is required. Create clinical note.'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"
  bisic-37.50http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZ.D2.DT.OutputsBCG immunization schedule is complete'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

name: Determine_if_the_client_is_due_for_a_bacille_Calmette_Gu_rin__BCG__vaccination_according_to_the_national_immunization_schedule
title: IMMZ.D2.DT.BCG ValueSet for Decision Table
description:
ValueSet IMMZ.D2.DT.BCG for Determine if the client is due for a bacille Calmette–Guérin (BCG) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule.
Business rule: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any
Trigger: undefined
Table: IMMZ.D2.DT.BCG
